M1message:
Hi,
I am RAVI, Ham Awa Association bot and the narrator of your story, so that the violence against Iranian girls and women is not forgotten in the dark.
Some questions will be asked in order for you to submit your story; please follow the processes until you reach the finish of your story.
Please choose one of the options:
S2message: Identifying the violator of human rights
redirect_message: Click [here](https://t.me/@iranhamava) to send a message to an operator.
